text: Events from the year 1502 in Ireland. ==Events== * April – Gerald FitzGerald, later Earl of Kildare, at the age of 15, played the principal role in the funeral ceremony for Henry VII's eldest son Arthur, Prince of Wales in Worcester Cathedral ==Births== ==Deaths== ==References== Henry VIII of England Category:1500s in Ireland Ireland Category:Years of the 16th century in Ireland
title: 1502 in Ireland
